column2: A housing development in which at least 20% or a minimum of 5 units, whichever is greater, are affordable housing units as defined by 24 V.S.A.§ 4303 (1). Affordable units shall be subject to covenants or restrictions that preserve their affordability for a minimum of 20 years from the date of their first sale or lease.
